programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

programme.title: Πολεμικές Τέχνες: UFC Fight Night 2024
programme.desc: ΗΑΕ, 'Αµπου Ντάµπι. Το καράτε ανταγωνίζεται το κουνγκ φου και το μποξ το ζίου ζίτσου. Το κικ μποξ έρχεται αντιμέτωπο με το τζούντο και η πάλη με το μάι τάι. Η 'μάχη' μεταξύ των πολεμικών τεχνών και η ανάδειξη του 'απόλυτου πρωταθλητή' μόνο στα κανάλια COSMOTE SPORT. Περιγραφή: Χρήστος Γάτσης.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Outdoor Specials
programme.desc: Το Outdoor Specials σας φέρνει τα πιο συναρπαστικά γεγονότα στον κόσμο των extreme sports. Από το windsurfing μέχρι την ορειβασία και από την οδήγηση αγώνων μέχρι τις καταδύσεις σπηλαίων, αυτή είναι μια σειρά που θα σας δώσει μια γενναιόδωρη δόση αδρεναλίνης.

programme.title: Βόλεϊ: Κορόνα Μπράσοβ - Ολυμπιακός
programme.desc: CEV Champions League Ανδρών 2025. 3ος Προκριµατικός Γύρος, 1η Αγωνιστική. Η 66η σεζόν του CEV Champions League Ανδρών φιλοξενεί 20 ομάδες στη φάση των ομίλων. Η ιταλική Τρεντίνο είναι η κάτοχος του τροπαίου. Περιγραφή: Γιώργος Μπιτσικώκος.

programme.title: Χάντμπολ: Μέλσουνγκεν - Ανόβερο
programme.desc: DAIKIN Hanball Bundesliga 2024-25. 16η Αγωνιστική. Η 60η σεζόν του γερμανικού πρωταθλήματος χάντμπολ διαρκεί από τον Αύγουστο του 2024 έως και τον Ιούνιο του 2025. Από τις 18 ομάδες που συμμετέχουν, δύο υποβιβάζονται, ενώ οι 5 πρώτοι εξασφαλίζουν ευρωπαϊκό εισιτήριο. Το Μαγδεμβούργο κέρδισε τον περσινό τίτλο. Περιγραφή: Παύλος Παλαιστής.

programme.title: Υδάτινα Σπορ: Ο Κόσμος της Ιστιοπλοΐας 2024
programme.desc: Η εκπομπή παρουσιάζει την καρδιά της ιστιοπλοΐας, από την κομψότητα και το πρεστίζ των εκπληκτικών γιοτ μέχρι την αντοχή που χρειάζεται στους αγώνες και τον σκληρό κόσμο των αγώνων dinghy και του kite surfing.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Outdoor Specials
programme.desc: Το Outdoor Specials σας φέρνει τα πιο συναρπαστικά γεγονότα στον κόσμο των extreme sports. Από το windsurfing μέχρι την ορειβασία και από την οδήγηση αγώνων μέχρι τις καταδύσεις σπηλαίων, αυτή είναι μια σειρά που θα σας δώσει μια γενναιόδωρη δόση αδρεναλίνης.

programme.title: Premier Padel Tour 2024
programme.desc: Barcelona Finals (1ος Ημιτελικός Γυναικών). Το Premier Padel είναι η μόνη διοργάνωση που προσφέρει επίσημους πόντους κατάταξης στους παίκτες και τα τουρνουά P1 απονέμουν στους νικητές 1000 πόντους κι ένα μεγάλο χρηματικό έπαθλο. Περιγραφή: Παύλος Παλαιστής.

programme.title: Sports Classics: The Outdoor Sports Show 2024
programme.desc: Αυτή η σειρά παρουσιάζει ένα ευρύ φάσμα υπαίθριων σπορ καθώς και τους αθλητές που αγωνίζονται σε αυτά. Η εκπομπή καλύπτει από επαγγελματικά και ψυχαγωγικά έως και extreme sports, όπως αγώνες μαραθωνίου, αναρρίχηση, σκι, σέρφινγκ, πεζοπορία, τρίαθλο, ιστιοπλοΐα και ποδηλασία.

programme.title: Sports Classics: 2024 Outdoor Specials
programme.desc: Το Outdoor Specials σας φέρνει τα πιο συναρπαστικά γεγονότα στον κόσμο των extreme sports. Από το windsurfing μέχρι την ορειβασία και από την οδήγηση αγώνων μέχρι τις καταδύσεις σπηλαίων, αυτή είναι μια σειρά που θα σας δώσει μια γενναιόδωρη δόση αδρεναλίνης.

programme.title: ATP Specials
programme.desc: Μια σειρά αφιερωμάτων σε στιγμές, αγώνες, τενίστες και τενίστριες που έγραψαν ιστορία στα τουρνουά ATP.

programme.title: Ράφα 'El Matador' Ναδάλ
programme.desc: ATP Masters Classics (2006 Tennis Masters Series Ρώμη, Τελικός). Παρακολουθήστε ορισμένες από τις πιο κορυφαίες 'παραστάσεις' της καριέρας του Ράφα Ναδάλ που ανακοίνωσε το τέλος της καριέρας του μέσα στο 2024. Περιγραφή: Πάνος Λούτας.

programme.title: Μπάσκετ: Τορόντο Ράπτορς - Χιούστον Ρόκετς
programme.desc: NBA 2024-25 - Κανονική Διάρκεια. Η 79η σεζόν του κορυφαίου πρωταθλήματος μπάσκετ του πλανήτη ξεκινά με τους Μπόστον Σέλτικς πρωταθλητές και τους Μιλγουόκι Μπακς του Γιάννη Αντετοκούνμπο να διεκδικούν τον τίτλο.

programme.title: NBA TV 2024-25
programme.desc: Απολαύστε ακόμη περισσότερη δράση από τον 'μαγικό' κόσμο του ΝΒΑ και παρακολουθήστε καθημερινά σε ζωντανή αναμετάδοση το NBA TV, το επίσημο κανάλι της κορυφαίας διοργάνωσης μπάσκετ του πλανήτη.

programme.title: Μπάσκετ: Αρμάνι Μιλάνο - Τραπάνι
programme.desc: Lega Basket Serie A 2024-25. 12η Αγωνιστική. Το ιταλικό πρωτάθλημα μπάσκετ ετοιμάζεται να μας δώσει μια συναρπαστική νέα σεζόν. Η πρωταθλήτρια Αρμάνι Μιλάνο και η Βίρτους Μπολόνια θα εξακολουθήσουν να παλεύουν για τον τίτλο ή θα πρέπει να περιμένουμε εκπλήξεις Περιγραφή: Νίκος Κουλούρης.

programme.title: NBA TV 2024-25
programme.desc: Απολαύστε ακόμη περισσότερη δράση από τον 'μαγικό' κόσμο του ΝΒΑ και παρακολουθήστε καθημερινά σε ζωντανή αναμετάδοση το NBA TV, το επίσημο κανάλι της κορυφαίας διοργάνωσης μπάσκετ του πλανήτη.

programme.title: Μπάσκετ: Μερκεζεφέντι - Αναντολού Εφές
programme.desc: Turkish Basketball Super League 2024-25. 11η Αγωνιστική. Η 59η σεζόν του τουρκικού πρωταθλήματος μπάσκετ περιλαμβάνει 16 ομάδες. Οι Γιάλοβασπορ και Μερσίν προβιβάστηκαν, ενώ η Φενέρμπαχτσε είναι η κάτοχος του τίτλου. Περιγραφή: Γιάννης Φιλέρης.

programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the younger brother of her boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: The Royal Nanny
programme.desc: Working under cover as a nanny, an MI5 agent must resist the charms of Prince Colin while keeping the royal family safe during Christmastime.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly: Lit Up
programme.desc: Emily and Jared are looking forward to celebrating the holidays together again, this time as a couple. They're also ready to work with members of the community to make this year's Christmas festivities the best yet.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: Three Wise Men and a Baby
programme.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together and care for a baby over the holidays.

programme.title: Leah's Perfect Gift
programme.desc: A Jewish Leah accompanies her boyfriend to Connecticut to experience a traditional Christmas with his family.

programme.title: Letters to Santa
programme.desc: When young siblings receive a magic pen from Santa that appears to be granting wishes, they request a Christmas gift they want more than anything -- for their separated parents to reunite.

programme.title: Scouting for Christmas
programme.desc: A single mom tries to make her daughter's Christmas special since her dad is working overseas for the holidays. She partners with her daughter's favorite baker for the Holiday Ball.

programme.title: The Most Colorful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A colorblind elementary school teacher meets an optometrist who helps bring color into his life in time for the holidays.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: A woman (Carla Gugino) tries to save her sister's (Laura Dern) children from foster care by taking them to a small town where she is mistaken for a missing heiress.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: Believe in Christmas
programme.desc: With no other plans for Christmas, best friends Bea and Emilia travel to Christmasland, a magical place filled with hope, holiday miracles and romance.

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: If I Only Had Christmas
programme.desc: A cheerful publicist teams up with a cynical business owner to help a charity in need at Christmastime.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: A Christmas Melody
programme.desc: A single mother moves back to her hometown with her young daughter. Having a hard time adjusting, the daughter seeks help from her music teacher to write a song for the Christmas variety show.

programme.title: Trading Up Christmas
programme.desc: Michelle tries to get her sister a new place to live and all she has is a Christmas stocking to trade with.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: The Christmas Train
programme.desc: A cynical journalist must get from Washington, D.C., to Los Angeles in time for Christmas, and his only option is to take the train.

programme.title: Christmas in the Air
programme.desc: A no-nonsense professional organizer (Catherine Bell) learns that opposites do attract when she begins to fall for her client, a frazzled widower (Eric Close) who spends his time inventing toys.

programme.title: Marry Me at Christmas
programme.desc: A bridal boutique owner who is deep in the flurry of planning an exquisite Christmas wedding is unexpectedly swept off her feet by the bride's brother.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: A former tour guide meets a busy single father on a Graceland tour and agrees to be his temporary nanny for the holidays.

programme.title: A Joyous Christmas
programme.desc: A successful motivational speaker learns the true meaning of Christmas when a stranger rescues her from a near-fatal accident.

programme.title: Five Gold Rings
programme.desc: An artist returns home for the holidays and gets tasked with a Christmas quest left by her grandmother. She and the local PI must return lost items to their owners before Christmas.

programme.title: Five More Minutes
programme.desc: Inspired by Scotty McCreery's song "Five More Minutes," a woman's Christmas wish is answered in unexpected ways when her late grandfather's journal turns up and reveals an untold romance.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: An ambitious married woman gets more than she bargained for when her wish to be single again is granted. She awakens to discover she's got everything she's ever wanted, except her husband. She resolves to find him a second time.

programme.title: Time for Me to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Two strangers, a businesswoman and a country music star, are both booked on a flight to Tulsa before the holidays, but it ends up getting canceled due to a snowstorm. They decide to try to get to Tulsa together, and share their secrets along the way.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: After moving back to her hometown, a woman plots with her siblings and grandparents to help her father's new bed and breakfast get a five-star review from an incognito travel critic.

programme.title: One December Night
programme.desc: Two music managers must put their history aside to oversee the televised reunion performance of their rock star fathers with a fractured past.

programme.title: Christmas in Homestead
programme.desc: An actress heads to the Christmas-obsessed town of Homestead, Iowa, to shoot a holiday-themed movie. She is shocked when a romance blooms with Matt, a single dad. As she gets a taste of small-town life, she discovers the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Hearts of Christmas
programme.desc: When a beloved neonatal intensive care unit supervisor is forced to take early retirement, her young colleague, Jenny, decides to turn the staff Christmas party into a surprise bash for her, but the plan is complicated by the hospital's new CFO.

programme.title: A Merry Christmas Match
programme.desc: A woman spends her time working in her mother's antique shop in a small ski village. One day she meets a man who makes her wonder if she should have left town and followed her dreams.

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple feign marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival and their business, but rekindled love is complicated by new opportunities.

programme.title: Christmas Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: Samantha, a freelance photographer, is returning to Cape Cod for the first time since the death of her mother years earlier. Having never been to the Cape during winter, she finds that it is a whole new experience than her many summers spent there.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: Nell's last stop on a nationwide book tour takes her to Springdale, the hometown of Emmett, a young man she met while both were junior copy editors at a New York publishing company.

programme.title: The Perfect Christmas Present
programme.desc: Tom Jacobs has built a business around helping clients find the perfect gift for their loved ones. When he's hired to find a gift for his friend's girlfriend, he finds himself in a bit of trouble: The more he researches her, the more he likes her.

programme.title: Time for You to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Katherine returns home after her husband passes and meets a veteran who is on his holiday journey. As Christmas nears, they learn of a bond that may be the miracle they need.

programme.title: Trading Up Christmas
programme.desc: Michelle tries to get her sister a new place to live and all she has is a Christmas stocking to trade with.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: After discovering a secret cave filled with wild dragons and their mysterious benefactor, Hiccup (Jay Baruchel) and Toothless find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace of Berk.

programme.title: Transformers

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After the world's great cities fall, a Marine staff sergeant (Aaron Eckhart) and his platoon make a last stand against alien invaders.

programme.desc: When young women start disappearing in a small town, a police officer and a street-smart social worker follow clues to a remote pig farm. As their investigation continues, they encounter a local butcher who's been bringing his work home with him.

programme.desc: Superliga Izraela u košarci je najviši rang košarkaških takmičenja u Izraelu. Liga je osnovana 1954. godine i trenutno broji 12 klubova. (LIVE).

programme.title: Zlatni golovi YU sporta
programme.desc: Mnogo je velikih momenata u istoriji jugoslovenskog fudbala, a mi smo izdvojili samo najbolje od najboljeg. Uvek je lepo setiti se tih lepih trenutaka.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Benfica - Estoril
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika. (LIVE).

programme.title: Sport & Tech Lifestyle
programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Odbojka - Italijanska liga (M): Lube - Milano
programme.desc: Što je u košarci NBA, to je u odbojci italijanska liga. Svaki meč je spektakl, a mnogi vrednuju ovu titulu više od nekog evropskog trofeja.

programme.title: Košarka - Litvanski kup: 1/4 Finale (1st leg): Siauliai - Zalgiris
programme.desc: Kup Litvanije poznat i kao Kup kralja Mindovga je godišnje košarkaško takmičenje koje se u ovoj zemlji održava od 2016. godine.

programme.title: Fudbal - Grčka liga: AEK - Levadiakos
programme.desc: Voli se fudbal u Grčkoj i svaki duel, pogotovo derbi, doživljava se sa mnogo strasti. Olimpijakos jeste favorit za titulu, ali AEK, PAOK i večiti rival Panatinaikos kucaju na vrata...

programme.title: Idealna putanja
programme.desc: Ceo život, vozači Formule 1 traže tu "idealnu putanju". Kako doći do nje i kako napraviti savršeni set-ap bolida i koliko vremena oduzima sve to, saznaćete u ovoj emisiji.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal - Myrtle Beach Bowl: Texas San Antonio - Coastal Carolina
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Pregled Evrolige: 17. KOLO
programme.desc: 18 najboljih timova Evrope ponovo se bore za titulu najboljeg na kontinentu. EFES je zasluženo uzeo titulu prošle sezone, a čini se da će imati nikada teži zadatak da je odbrane. Mogu li Zvezda i...

programme.title: Košarka - Litvanski kup: 1/4 Finale (1st leg): Nevezis - Lietkabelis
programme.desc: Kup Litvanije poznat i kao Kup kralja Mindovga je godišnje košarkaško takmičenje koje se u ovoj zemlji održava od 2016. godine.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Estrela Amadora - Rio Ave
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal - Potato Bowl: Fresno State - Northern Illinois
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Put do vrha
programme.desc: Neverovatne priče o usponu tamnoputih sportista do samog vrha: Između ostalih, Lebron Džejms i Serena Vilijams...

programme.title: Pregled holandske lige
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga (ž): Bielsko Biala - Budowlani Lodz
programme.desc: Uživajte uz utakmice najvišeg ranga ženskog, ligaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj na kom učestvuju najbolji odbojkaški klubovi ove zemlje.

programme.title: Fudbal - Holandska liga: Sparta - Ajax
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Košarka - Australijska liga: Melbourne - Tasmania
programme.desc: Nema boljeg načina da se počne dan nego uz australijsku košarku. Uzeli su medalju na Olimpijskim igrama, hale su pune i napreduju iz godine u godinu.

programme.title: Rukomet - Nemačka liga: Melsungen - Hannover
programme.desc: Rukometna Bundesliga je najviši rang takmičenja u Nemačkoj. Kvalitetom igre smatra se jednim od najkvalitetnijih rukometnih liga na svetu.

programme.title: Pregled Bundeslige
programme.desc: Uz sve ono što nam je Nemačka podarila kroz istoriju ponosno stoji i Bundesliga. Najviši rang fudbalskog takmičenja osnovanog 1963. godine broji 18 ekipa koje svakog avgusta kreću u trku za popularnim...

programme.title: MUTV: Manchester United - Bournemouth (PL)
programme.desc: Donosimo vam najnovije vesti i reportaže iz "Mančester junajteda", kluba velike tradicije i reputacije. Klub je osnovan 1878. godine i tokom decenija je iznedrio velike fudbalske zvezde.

programme.title: Košarka - Litvanski kup: 1/4 Finale (1st leg): Siauliai - Zalgiris
programme.desc: Kup Litvanije poznat i kao Kup kralja Mindovga je godišnje košarkaško takmičenje koje se u ovoj zemlji održava od 2016. godine.

programme.title: Košarka - Francuska liga: Paris - Limoges
programme.desc: Francuska košarkaška liga, LNB Pro A, osnovana je 1921. godine. 18 ekipa se kroz regularni deo i plej of bori za titulu prvaka Francuske.

programme.title: CS2 - Perfect World Major Shanghai
programme.desc: Najbolji Counter-Strike timovi sveta doleću u Šangaj kako bi se borili na drugom ovogodišnjem Major turniru. Da li će NAVI odbraniti titulu ili će G2 otplesati svoj poslednji ples sa dugo očekivanim...
